helps.text:
River of spirits.
Converted & edited by REAL MUDDERS
Special thanx to Serdar & Anatolia Consortium

objects.name: eldiven qualyn alev kadim
objects.description: Kayýp bir ruha ait bir çift alevden eldiven yerde yanýyor.

extra_descriptions.description: Just try to recite it and see what happen.
Just try to recite it and see what happen.

objects.name: alev xen nefes
objects.description: Kadim bir ejderha efendisine ait bir nefes burada dinleniyor.

objects.name: kýrbaç dehþet teosaki
objects.description: Kayýp bir ruha ait kýrbaç þekline bürünmüþ bir dehþet parçacýðý uzanýyor.

mobiles.name: kadim büyücü
mobiles.long_description: Yaþlý bir adam kendi kendine konuþarak etrafta dolanýyor.
mobiles.description: He is old, despite being old he looks strong and wise.

mobiles.name: iblis buz
mobiles.description: Brrr.. you fell cold as you look at his face.

mobiles.name: kaybolmuþ iblis
mobiles.long_description: Kaybolmuþ bir iblis burada yolunu bulmaya çalýþýyor.
mobiles.description:
He is lost looking for the way his home.You should help him if he did
not grin evilly at you.Better keep your distanse.

mobiles.name: iblis kýzgýn
mobiles.long_description: Kýzgýn bir iblis burada kendisine bir kurban arýyor.
mobiles.description:
Angry very angry, wispering something buy you can not understand what he
says sumone must have disturbed him, he will probubly will revange first
he see someone else.

mobiles.name: iblis ateþ
mobiles.long_description: Bir ateþ iblisi burada lavlarla oynuyor.
mobiles.description: He is burning , flames surround him.

mobiles.name: anka kuþu
mobiles.long_description: Bir anka kuþu burada þarkýlar söylüyor.

mobiles.name: su alalisi
mobiles.long_description: Bir su alalisi burada suyla oynuyor.

mobiles.name: ruh dehþet ejderhasý
mobiles.description:
A spriti but has its original body after he died.Here he is behind you
within his full nothingnes and anger, being killed, hunted.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyonun Giriþi
rooms.description:
This is the old sweer system of this cursed prison.Exits are north
and down.

rooms.name: Kanalizasyon
rooms.description:
This is a dark and teribbly smelling tunnel.You can't see the
start and the end of the tunnel.Just the sound comming from the
continuing end of the tunnel.You just feel that there is an exit.If
you are wrong? what will happen.A dead end? an exitless maze? or death?
You don't know what is whaiting you there, now it't time to go.
     There is a small tablet on the wall.

rooms.name: Karanlýk tünel
rooms.description:
You still feel that terible smell.From where does it come?
There is watter ant he floor of tunnel but it't so clear that you can
drink it.No it comes from a different place, from walls ? no not from
walls.Something frightens you, you should better turn back.

rooms.name: Karanlýk tünel
rooms.description:
The tunnel is dark and frightining.You still fell that smell and
hear this meanless sound, what is it ? It sounds like a warning message,
no no it's different, someone is crying; himm sounds like; but not, well
better walk and find out what the problem is.

rooms.name: Karanlýk tünel
rooms.description:
The tunnel is dark and frightining.You still fell that smell and
hear this meanless sound, what is it ? It sounds like a warning message,
no no it's different, someone is crying; himm sounds like; but not, well
better walk and find out what the problem is.

rooms.description:
The tunnel is dark and frightining.You still fell that smell and
hear this meanless sound, what is it ? It sounds like a warning message,
no no it's different, someone is crying; himm sounds like; but not, well

rooms.name: Karanlýk tünel
rooms.description:
At last you see a light at the end of the tunnel, and the sound
got clear.You don't feel that smell anymore.And the sound , you realise
that the sound was just the sound of a watterfall.The tunnels made it
sound like that, himm relaxing sound.

rooms.name: Karanlýk tünelin çýkýþý
rooms.description:
It's brighter now.You can see all around without the help of your
light source.It's more clear that the sound is coming from a watterfall.
But where is this watterfall?

rooms.name: Þelale
rooms.description:
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
        You have fallen.Luckyly you haven't injured yourself.Wow it was
really high.You don't have a chance of climbing up there.Better continue
your way, from the river.Himm nice place.Looks like the part of heaven.
You hear the sings of birds, makes you relax, and feel wonderfull.This
place is full of peace...This is the land of lost spirits.

rooms.name: Ruhlar Nehri
rooms.description:
This is a wonderfull place with full of peace.The river you are on is
wonderfull.Birds flovers everywhere, and the sound of birds , peaceful
isn't it?

rooms.name: Bahçe yolu
rooms.description:
This road seems to confinue forever, on one side of the road is river
and the other side is a beautiful flover garden , birds , trees , flowers
peace and the spirits, they look happy becouse of being here.Yes you see
goodnes because of being good in real life , this must be heaven , or part
of heaven yes this wonderfull place is part of heaven.

rooms.name: Cehennem yolu
rooms.description:
My god.What is this? Tere was no such wiev from looking the river, you
got shocked.What happened here , why all the trees burned? Is this a resoult
of fire?There are also spirits here but they look very unhappy?They see
badness becouse of the baddnes they have done in real world.

rooms.name: Tarafsýzlýk Okyanusu
rooms.description:
All you see the endless watter , surrounding you!With the whole
loneless and the balance between evil and good, ugly and beauty, chaos
and rule, war and peace.This endless ocean makes you think of all these.
With no reason you  think about all these .BUT BUT one a sudden howe will
you exit from here?

rooms.name: Derin çukur
rooms.description:
You are at the bottom of a deep hole you can see around ,
you realise that there is no exit; a place able to keep a powerful
dragon or its spirit!
